content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a wooden chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) for storing coal.

### Coal powered furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0) fueled by coal.

### Coal transportation system
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) that transports coal from the chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5) to the chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
- Check the chest's inventory to avoid attempting to extract items that are not present.

### Errors when using a burner mining drill
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full to avoid interruptions in mining operations.
- Empty the chest at the drop position regularly to continue mining.

### Errors when using a burner inserter
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up to avoid waiting for source items.
- Check the neighbours of the inserter to ensure they have items to be picked up.
